column6: The monsters are crawling out of the woodwork now! While guest-star Reed Richards examines young Billy Connors to find out what's affecting Spider-Man's animal foes, the Man-Wolf closes in on an unsuspecting Mary Jane and a rabid Vermin enters the fray. It's a showdown in the catacombs beneath the Natural History Museum involving Spidey, Black Cat, the Lizard, and others!
column8: | writer:Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa | inker:Scott Hanna | penciller (cover):Angel Medina | letterer:Cory Petit
